product_info.title: ZQ630 Plus RFID Mobile Printer
product_info.tagline: Premium mobile printing and RFID capabilities for maximum productivity
product_info.description: The ZQ630 Plus RFID Mobile Printer combines premium mobile printing performance with advanced RFID capabilities to deliver maximum productivity, ease of use, and manageability. Designed for demanding enterprise environments, it supports on-demand RFID label and tag printing, features Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.3 for fast connectivity, and integrates Zebra’s Print DNA software suite for superior management, security, and reliability.

printer.maximum_print_speed: Up to 4.5 in./115 mm per second
printer.media_sensors: Black mark sensing using fixed center position sensors; label present sensor for issuing batch labels one at a time

dimensions.imperial: 7.35 in. L x 6.5 in. W x 3.25 in. H
dimensions.metric: 187 mm L x 165 mm W x 82.5 mm H

media.label_and_liner_length: 0.5 in./12.7 mm to 32 in./813 mm or continuous
media.maximum_roll_size: 2.6 in./66 mm O.D. on 0.75 in./19 mm or 1.375 in./34.9 mm inner core
media.thickness: 3.2 mil to 5.5 mil tag stock or 7.5 mil label stock

power.battery: 6600 mAh (nominal) 47.5 Wh removable PowerPrecision+ Li-Ion battery

features: Adaptive Encoding Technology for simplified RFID setup
Automatic calibration requiring no recalibration with same media type
RFID job-monitoring tools for performance tracking
RFID ZPL command compatibility with existing Zebra RFID printers
Supports all RFID tag data standards including SGTIN-96, DSGTIN+, GS1 TDS 2.0, RAIN ISO CIN
Prints and encodes tags with minimum pitch of 16 mm

standard: Apple iOS, Android, and Windows Mobile connectivity
Direct thermal printing of barcodes, text, and graphics
CPCL, EPL, and ZPL programming language support
Black mark sensing and label present sensor
Large 288x240 pixel color display with customizable WML interface
5-way navigation keys with two programmable soft keys
IP54 dust and water resistance rating
Drop tolerance up to 6 ft./1.83 m
Power Smart Print Technology™ for optimized energy efficiency
Zebra Print Touch with NFC pairing
Mirror, SNMP, WebServer, AirWatch™, SOTI™ MobiControl™, and Ivanti Avalanche™ support
optional: RFID media and inlays (custom options available)

fonts_and_barcodes.standard_fonts: 25 bitmapped, 1 smooth scalable (CG Triumvirate Bold Condensed, UFST™ from Agfa Monotype)

features: 802.1x EAP support (EAP-FAST, EAP-TTLS, EAP-TLS, PEAP, LEAP)

connectivity.connector: Mini-B connector with optional strain relief

compliance.security: FIPS support available as a free printer OS download

warranty.coverage: Warranted against defects in workmanship and materials for 1 year from date of shipment. Batteries warranted for 1 year, printheads for 6 months.

additional_information.zebra_dna: Print DNA software suite built into all Link-OS printers, offering advanced management, security, and performance tools.
additional_information.printer_profile_manager: Browser-based remote management for all Zebra Link-OS printers, enabling discovery, configuration, and troubleshooting.
additional_information.zebraonecare: Comprehensive service plans providing technical support, repair coverage, and visibility services.

services.visibility_services: Real-time insights into printer operational status and utilization.
services.technical_support: 24/7 technical support included with Zebra OneCare.
services.repair_services: Comprehensive coverage including accidental damage and defined turnaround times.
